alert.note: Alert for Lyon; Plymouth; Sioux; Woodbury (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued October 03 at 7:44PM CDT until October 03 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 701 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 11 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN IOWA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 4 COUNTIES IN NORTHWEST IOWA LYON PLYMOUTH SIOUX IN WEST CENTRAL IOWA WOODBURY IN MINNESOTA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 3 COUNTIES IN SOUTHWEST MINNESOTA LINCOLN PIPESTONE ROCK IN NEBRASKA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 2 COUNTIES IN NORTHEAST NEBRASKA DAKOTA DIXON IN SOUTH DAKOTA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 10 COUNTIES IN EAST CENTRAL SOUTH DAKOTA BROOKINGS LAKE MOODY IN SOUTHEAST SOUTH DAKOTA CLAY LINCOLN MCCOOK MINNEHAHA TURNER UNION YANKTON THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ALCESTER, ALLEN, BERESFORD, BRIDGEWATER, BROOKINGS, CANISTOTA, CANTON, CENTERVILLE, CHANCELLOR, ELK POINT, FLANDREAU, GEORGE, HARRISBURG, HAWARDEN, HENDRICKS, HULL, HURLEY, INWOOD, IRENE, IVANHOE, JEFFERSON, LAKE BENTON, LARCHWOOD, LE MARS, LENNOX, LUVERNE, MADISON, MARION, MONTROSE, NORTH SIOUX CITY, ORANGE CITY, ORLAND, PARKER, PIPESTONE, PONCA, ROCK RAPIDS, ROCK VALLEY, SALEM, SIOUX CENTER, SIOUX CITY, SIOUX FALLS, SOUTH SIOUX CITY, TEA, TYLER, VERMILLION, VIBORG, WAKEFIELD, AND YANKTON.
